abstracts.cdata!:
The project, which will be co-financed
            by the UNCDF with a US$1.6 million grant, consists of the
            construction of 15 unit centers, survey, registration, and
            land demarcation provision of credit to farmers, extension
            services, livestock development, health facilities and
            operating funds for a project evaluation and preparation
            work on the NRDP.
